title: Sri Lanka: Secretary on Public Security resigns
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st);  Retired Maj. Gen. Jagath Alwis has resigned as Secretary to the Ministry of Public Security, after providing a statement to the Criminal Investigations Department on the events that broke out at the MynaGoGama and GotaGoGama protest sites in Colombo.
21A to cabinet today (23), if not will NOT remain in govt, warns Harin
Sri Lanka: Two-day old baby dies as fuel crisis forces delay in admitting her to hospital
